name: Gods of Egypt: Of Gods and Mortals: The Cast
detailed_description: Gerard Butler and Nikolaj Coster-Waldau portray the titanic gods, Set and Horus, and surrounding them is an equally powerful group of actors. We join this amazing ensemble as they get into character.
about_the_game: Gerard Butler and Nikolaj Coster-Waldau portray the titanic gods, Set and Horus, and surrounding them is an equally powerful group of actors. We join this amazing ensemble as they get into character.
